actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 109-104.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests

official_title: A bill to make a technical correction relating to the land conveyance authorized by Public Law 108-67.

summary.text: Makes a technical correction relating to the description of the conveyance authorized by Public Law 108-67 (a law providing for the conveyance of certain land to the Washoe Indian Tribe of Nevada and California).

titles.title: A bill to make a technical correction relating to the land conveyance authorized by Public Law 108-67.
